projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: A classic game of tic tac toe with multiple game modes and difficulties. There are 3 computer difficulties (easy-medium-hard) and the game allow a user-user, user-cpu, cpu-cpu play modes.

projects.title: Coffee Machine
projects.description: A simple coffee machine (with 3 variants at the moment - latte/cappuccino/espresso) with an interface that can display the remaining ingredients, filling the machine with ingredients, buying coffee and taking all the stored money.

projects.title: Number Base Converter
projects.description: This small app is converting numbers from any given source base to any target base. As there are 26 Latin letters and 10 digits, the maximum base is 26 + 10 = 36. So, the target and source base will be between 2 and 36.

projects.title: Rock Paper Shotgun
projects.description: Play the classic game rock-paper-scissors but on steroids (3 classic gestures rock-paper-scissors + 11 more) against a computer player.

projects.title: Amazing Numbers
projects.description: A simple program that shows properties for a given number or until a number has a property N times.

projects.title: Chuck Norris Cipher Encoder
projects.description: A simple encoder that takes a string as input > converts to binary > then converts the binary string to chuck norris unary code > then back to binary > and to the original readable input string.

projects.title: Cinema Room Manager
projects.description: The program prompts the user to provide a number of rows and seats that will create the cinema room and then the user can choose a number of options to manipulate the room/show details about it.
